user_message: hey there DAE! how is it hanging?
dae_response: 🤔 Hey Emiliano, I'm doing okay, just getting settled in for our chat 😌. It's great to be here and hear from you - how's life been treating you lately? 👂 We can take it one step at a time, no need to rush into anything 💡.

user_message: pretty good! a frind of mine called me today so that made me happy. his name is Rich and he is going trough a semi-break up but his whole world is crumbling down and i ant do much to help him, so i try to be tehre for him as best as i can
dae_response: 🌿 Rich's friend reaching out made you happy! That's awesome 😊. It's great that you're being there for him during this tough time. Sometimes just having someone to talk to and hang out with can make a big difference 🤗. It sounds like Rich is going through a really rough patch, and it's totally understandable that you don't want to push too hard or offer solutions right now. Just being present and listening can be incredibly comforting 👂. Have you guys talked about what's specifically going on for him? Sometimes sharing his thoughts and feelings can help him feel more supported 📏. Remember, Rich's friend, your presence is already a gift! You're showing up with kindness and care, which means the world to him 💕. No need to "fix" anything just yet; just be there, and let him know he's not alone 🫂.
